snippet: Former Gov. Bill Richardson of New Mexico and Google’s executive chairman, Eric E. Schmidt, were advised against a visit to the country, though an expert says it might aid in the discussion of a detained American citizen.
abstract: State Department says it has advised against  visit to North Korea by former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson and Google’s executive chairman Eric E Schmidt, though expert says visit might aid in discussion of detained American citizen Kenneth Bae.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Bill Richardson of New Mexico and Google’s executive chairman, Eric E. Schmidt, were advised against a visit to the country, though an expert says it might aid in the discussion of a detained American citizen.

headline.seo: Bill Richardson and Google’s Eric Schmidt Are Advised Not to Visit North Korea
headline.main: 2 Americans Are Advised Not to Visit North Korea
headline.print_headline: 2 Americans Are Advised Not to Visit North Korea

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
